  • Method Details

    • create

      public static String create(Object obj, String table)
      Generates a CREATE statement for a given object and table name.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object for which to generate the CREATE statement.
      table - The name of the table to be created.
      Returns:
      The generated CREATE statement as a string.

    • select

      public static String select(String table, String... fields)
      Generates a SELECT statement for a given table and fields.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table to select from.
      fields - The fields to select (optional).
      Returns:
      The generated SELECT statement as a string.

    • selectFetch

      public static String selectFetch(String field, String table, String fetched)
      Generates a SELECT...FETCH query for retrieving records with a fetched alias from a table.
      Parameters:
      table - the name of the table
      fetched - the alias for the fetched field
      field - the field to be fetched
      Returns:
      the SELECT FETCH SQL query

    • update

      public static String update(Object obj)
      Generates an UPDATE statement for a given object.
      Parameters:
      obj - The object for which to generate the UPDATE statement.
      Returns:
      The generated UPDATE statement as a string.

    • delete

      public static String delete(String id)
      Generates a DELETE statement for a given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the record to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The generated DELETE statement as a string.

    • relate

      public static String relate(String id1, String verb, String id2)
      Generates a RELATE statement to establish a relationship between two IDs with a given verb.
      Parameters:
      id1 - The ID of the first record.
      verb - The relationship.
      id2 - The ID of the second record.
      Returns:
      The generated RELATE statement as a string.
